snippet: The United States and the rest of the world cannot acquiesce to the military’s brutality.
abstract: Editorial contends the United States and the rest of the world need not accept choice being promoted by Egyptian generals between military rule or instability; calls for suspension of US military aid to Egypt; maintains the US cannot be complicit in the unfolding disaster there.
lead_paragraph: The United States and the rest of the world cannot acquiesce to the military’s brutality.

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
